law.catch_line: Fees for issuing identifying plates and papers to motor carriers.
law.text: For motor carriers defined under KRS 138.655(5) and (7) and for the purposes of tax collection, the department may charge a fee of ten dollars ($10) in each instance for the issuance of such identifying plates, decals, cards, signs, or papers, for the identification of motor vehicles, operated within the state.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 23, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 265, sec. 1, effective April 1, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art IV, sec. 20(2). -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 4. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 8. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 11. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 15.
